mainKpi.label: Investment Readiness
mainKpi.executive_summary: The startup has strong traction in the market and is a good fit for your strategy and investor profile. The tech is promising considering the market outlook and the team shows potential.

green_flags: Blue ocean with strong expert outlook
red_flags: Exagerated market size in pitch deck

Deep_dive.title: Tech Deep Dive
Deep_dive.summary: Look again into feasibility of the technology. Look into patent and IP risks.

Deep_dive.title: Founder background
Deep_dive.summary: No relevant industry experience found for founder A. Look into it and ask for further details.

Deep_dive.title: Hot Topic
Deep_dive.summary: This tech has been mention in many hyped blogs and news articles. Look into other investments in this space.

insights.title: Market outlook
insights.summary: Demand signals strong in DACH with 120% YoY growth.

insights.title: Competitor landscape
insights.summary: Top competitors are BigCorpA and BigCorpB. Two critical IP dependencies; escrow or alternative vendors needed.

insights.title: Team potential
insights.summary: Team went through 2 founder programs, know each other since university. Founders also worked together at BigCorpA.
